casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Emanuel SILAS. No. 171PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2005. Thomas K. Maher, Chapel Hill, for James Emanuel Silas. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of November 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 7th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of November 2005."
